page.title: 10Pets
page.content: Everyone in our class has at least one pet.The most popular pets are cats and just over a third of us have both a cat and a dog. The dogs are of many different breeds. Most common are labradors and mongrels and crossbred. The next most popular pets are in order, rabbits, fish and birds. Two children have horses, others would like to have one as well but the main problem is that animals cost to much to keep. When it comes to looking after pets, our mothers seem to do most of the work but about half of us take at least some share. My family has three horses , we like riding and having horses. We have also got an Alsation dog called Jody, and two cats that I feed. When I get a chance to take our dog for a walk I take her a long walk.
